sentences.sContent: The experimenter said “Look at my toy!
sentences.sCn: 试验者对孩子说：“看看我的玩具！

sentences.sContent: The pull we all feel to please the experimenter, to fit in with the situation, to do what is expected of us.
sentences.sContent_eng: The pull we all feel to please the experimenter, to fit in with the situation, to do what is expected of us.
sentences.sCn: 我们都会受到一种拉力，它让我们想要讨好实验者，融入情境中，做别人期待我们去做的事情。

sentences.sContent: With a second group of children, the experimenter acted differently.
sentences.sContent_eng: With a second group of children, the experimenter acted differently.
sentences.sCn: 对于第二组孩子，试验者采取的方法不同。
